channel.title: Can't log into my own server
channel.description:
:| :confused: :eek: PROBLEM :eek: :confused: :|
Every time I try to log into my own server it says; "Error connecting to server. Must be down. etc..." Sometimes it says in the console; "Cannot connect to port 4....""-port alredy open?" I have input my ip address, port number, have a running "Runserver" and "Running Bot" windows and a connected hamchi window.
What am I doing wrong? Advice toward solving this problem, will be greatly appreciated, little or large.
Thanks Heaps
Hmpph :confused: :eek: :confused:

item.title: Can't log into my own server
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

a. Dont use hamachi, its gay.
b. once you have a server running, (the .bat file called “runserver”) type in localhost for the IP in moparscape and youre connected, otherwise its a problem with the server youre running.

Read full topic
item.source: Can't log into my own server

item.title: Can't log into my own server
item.dc:creator: @Jonathan_M Jonathan M
item.description:
@Jonathan_M wrote:

You allready have a server started, if its a server like testscape and you got into the moparscape thing, make sure you DID NOT hit make server (before you opened testscape or pimpscape or wtf ever scape)

Read full topic
